name: Peppermill Grand Suite
description: At 495 sq. ft., Peppermill's Grand Suites are even more spacious than the Tower Spa Suites. These luxury hotel suites feature a relaxing in-room jetted hot tub, sitting area, and high-definition television — perfect for golfers looking to unwind after a full day on the courses.
shortDescription: 495 sq. ft. luxury suite with in-room jetted hot tub at Peppermill Resort Reno.

faqs.question: How big is the Peppermill Grand Suite?
faqs.answer: 495 sq. ft. — larger than the Tower Spa Suites, with an in-room jetted hot tub and sitting area.

faqs.question: Can Golf the High Sierra book Peppermill Grand Suites for my group?
faqs.answer: Yes — we negotiate group rates and room blocks for all Peppermill room types as part of your golf package.

testimonials.quote: The Grand Suite at Peppermill was worth every penny. Huge room, jetted tub, and we had a great rate through GTHS.
testimonials.author: Mark H.

testimonials.quote: Upgraded to a Grand Suite for our golf weekend. Spacious, luxurious, and the jetted tub was perfect after 36 holes.
testimonials.author: Brian W.
